author: andschwa
body: instead of using the build share get it from myget similar to how msbuild grabs it in the corefx project https   www.myget.org F dotnet core   this requires nuget 3.0 beta   VSO create date - 4/23/2015 11:31:00     VSO closed date - 12/17/2015 11:47:00
title: automate copying CoreCLR/CoreFx from myget
